Plot: A young boy is whisked away to the mythical land of Tao where he becomes the center of a conflict between an evil lord and a group of animal warriors.
Title: Warriors of Virtue
Writer: Michael Vickerman (screenplay), Hugh Kelley (screenplay), Dennis K. Law (characters), Ron Law (characters), Chris Law (characters), Jeremy Law (characters)
Actors: Angus Macfadyen, Mario Yedidia, Marley Shelton, Chao Li Chi
